#    Name:		PETSCII VIC-1001 Japanese katakana to Unicode Table
#    Unicode version:	3.0
#    Table version:	1.00
#    Table format:	Format A
#    Date:		13/04/21
#    Authors:		Simon Rowe <srowe@mose.org.uk>, Linus Walleij <triad@df.lth.se>
#    General notes:	Licensed under the GNU GPL, version 2

#IMPORT file://include/common-control.txt
#IMPORT file://include/ascii-1963-symbols.txt
#IMPORT file://include/ascii-1963-uppercase.txt
#IMPORT file://include/vic1001-c0-c1.txt

# Duplicate katakana characters

0x7F	0x30F2	#KATAKANA LETTER WO
0xA1	0x309C	#SEMI-VOICED SOUND MARK
0xB2	0x30A4	#KATAKANA LETTER I
0xB3	0x30A6	#KATAKANA LETTER U
0xB4	0x30A8	#KATAKANA LETTER E
0xB5	0x30AA	#KATAKANA LETTER O
0xB7	0x30AD	#KATAKANA LETTER KI
0xB8	0x30AF	#KATAKANA LETTER KU
0xB9	0x30B1	#KATAKANA LETTER KE
0xBD	0x30B9	#KATAKANA LETTER SU
0xDE	0x309B	#VOICED SOUND MARK
0xE3	0x30A6	#KATAKANA LETTER U
0xE4	0x30A8	#KATAKANA LETTER E
0xE5	0x30AA	#KATAKANA LETTER O
0xE6	0x30AB	#KATAKANA LETTER KA
0xE7	0x30AD	#KATAKANA LETTER KI
0xE8	0x30AF	#KATAKANA LETTER KU
0xE9	0x30B1	#KATAKANA LETTER KE
0xEA	0x309B	#VOICED SOUND MARK
0xEC	0x30B9	#KATAKANA LETTER SU
0xEF	0x309C	#SEMI-VOICED SOUND MARK
0xF8	0x30ED	#KATAKANA LETTER RO
0xF9	0x30F3	#KATAKANA LETTER N
0xFA	0x30B3	#KATAKANA LETTER KO
0xFB	0x30B5	#KATAKANA LETTER SA
0xFC	0x30B7	#KATAKANA LETTER SI

# Duplicate common box & line drawing characters

0x60	0x2500	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT HORIZONTAL
0x7B	0x253C	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT VERTICAL AND HORIZONTAL
0x7D	0x2502	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT VERTICAL
0xEB	0x251C	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT VERTICAL AND RIGHT
0xED	0x2514	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT UP AND RIGHT
0xEE	0x2510	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT DOWN AND LEFT

# Duplicate miscellaneous characters
0x7E	0x03C0	#GREEK SMALL LETTER PI
0xFF	0x03C0	#GREEK SMALL LETTER PI

# Katakana characters

0x61	0x30C1	#KATAKANA LETTER TI
0x62	0x30C4	#KATAKANA LETTER TU
0x63	0x30C6	#KATAKANA LETTER TE
0x64	0x30C8	#KATAKANA LETTER TO
0x65	0x30CA	#KATAKANA LETTER NA
0x66	0x30CB	#KATAKANA LETTER NI
0x67	0x30CC	#KATAKANA LETTER NU
0x68	0x30CD	#KATAKANA LETTER NE
0x69	0x30CE	#KATAKANA LETTER NO
0x6A	0x30CF	#KATAKANA LETTER HA
0x6B	0x30D2	#KATAKANA LETTER HI
0x6C	0x30D5	#KATAKANA LETTER HU
0x6D	0x30D8	#KATAKANA LETTER HE
0x6E	0x30DB	#KATAKANA LETTER HO
0x6F	0x30DE	#KATAKANA LETTER MA
0x70	0x30DF	#KATAKANA LETTER MI
0x71	0x30E0	#KATAKANA LETTER MU
0x72	0x30E1	#KATAKANA LETTER ME
0x73	0x30E2	#KATAKANA LETTER MO
0x74	0x30E4	#KATAKANA LETTER YA
0x75	0x30E6	#KATAKANA LETTER YU
0x76	0x30E8	#KATAKANA LETTER YO
0x77	0x30E9	#KATAKANA LETTER RA
0x78	0x30EA	#KATAKANA LETTER RI
0x79	0x30EB	#KATAKANA LETTER RU
0x7A	0x30EC	#KATAKANA LETTER RE
0x7C	0x30EF	#KATAKANA LETTER WA
0xA2	0x30A4	#KATAKANA LETTER I
0xA3	0x30A6	#KATAKANA LETTER U
0xA4	0x30A8	#KATAKANA LETTER E
0xA5	0x30AA	#KATAKANA LETTER O
0xA6	0x30F2	#KATAKANA LETTER WO
0xA7	0x30AD	#KATAKANA LETTER KI
0xA8	0x30AF	#KATAKANA LETTER KU
0xA9	0x30B1	#KATAKANA LETTER KE
0xAA	0x309B	#VOICED SOUND MARK
0xAC	0x30B9	#KATAKANA LETTER SU
0xAF	0x309C	#SEMI-VOICED SOUND MARK
0xB1	0x30A2	#KATAKANA LETTER A
0xB6	0x30AB	#KATAKANA LETTER KA
0xBA	0x30B3	#KATAKANA LETTER KO
0xBB	0x30B5	#KATAKANA LETTER SA
0xBC	0x30B7	#KATAKANA LETTER SI
0xBE	0x30BB	#KATAKANA LETTER SE
0xBF	0x30BD	#KATAKANA LETTER SO
0xC0	0x30BF	#KATAKANA LETTER TA
0xC1	0x30C1	#KATAKANA LETTER TI
0xC2	0x30C4	#KATAKANA LETTER TU
0xC3	0x30C6	#KATAKANA LETTER TE
0xC4	0x30C8	#KATAKANA LETTER TO
0xC5	0x30CA	#KATAKANA LETTER NA
0xC6	0x30CB	#KATAKANA LETTER NI
0xC7	0x30CC	#KATAKANA LETTER NU
0xC8	0x30CD	#KATAKANA LETTER NE
0xC9	0x30CE	#KATAKANA LETTER NO
0xCA	0x30CF	#KATAKANA LETTER HA
0xCB	0x30D2	#KATAKANA LETTER HI
0xCC	0x30D5	#KATAKANA LETTER HU
0xCD	0x30D8	#KATAKANA LETTER HE
0xCE	0x30DB	#KATAKANA LETTER HO
0xCF	0x30DE	#KATAKANA LETTER MA
0xD0	0x30DF	#KATAKANA LETTER MI
0xD1	0x30E0	#KATAKANA LETTER MU
0xD2	0x30E1	#KATAKANA LETTER ME
0xD3	0x30E2	#KATAKANA LETTER MO
0xD4	0x30E4	#KATAKANA LETTER YA
0xD5	0x30E6	#KATAKANA LETTER YU
0xD6	0x30E8	#KATAKANA LETTER YO
0xD7	0x30E9	#KATAKANA LETTER RA
0xD8	0x30EA	#KATAKANA LETTER RI
0xD9	0x30EB	#KATAKANA LETTER RU
0xDA	0x30EC	#KATAKANA LETTER RE
0xDB	0x30ED	#KATAKANA LETTER RO
0xDC	0x30EF	#KATAKANA LETTER WA
0xDD	0x30F3	#KATAKANA LETTER N
0xDF	0x30F2	#KATAKANA LETTER WO
0xF4	0x5E74	#YEAR, PERSON'S AGE
0xF5	0x6708	#MONTH
0xF6	0x65E5	#DAY, DAYTIME
0xF7	0x30BF	#KATAKANA LETTER TA
0xFE	0x30BB	#KATAKANA LETTER SE

# Common box & line drawing characters

0xAB	0x251C	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT VERTICAL AND RIGHT
0xAD	0x2514	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT UP AND RIGHT
0xAE	0x2510	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT DOWN AND LEFT
0xB0	0x2500	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT HORIZONTAL
0xE1	0x253C	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT VERTICAL AND HORIZONTAL
0xE2	0x2502	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT VERTICAL
0xF0	0x250C	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT DOWN AND RIGHT
0xF1	0x2534	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT UP AND HORIZONTAL
0xF2	0x252C	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT DOWN AND HORIZONTAL
0xF3	0x2524	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT VERTICAL AND LEFT
0xFD	0x2518	#BOX DRAWINGS LIGHT UP AND LEFT

0x5C	0x00A5	#YEN SIGN
0xA0	0x00A0	#NO-BREAK SPACE
0xE0	0x30C0	#GREEK SMALL LETTER PI
